title: FS: 1888 Allen & Ginter N36 American Indian $50
author: Wannabeoldschool

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Allen & Ginter N36 American Indian $50
posts.post_content:
If you have any concerns you check out my Blowout (rememberthepast) or eBay (wannabeoldschool) account for feedback. I've done a few transactions here as well. 

NOW $50 dlvd F/F. One last price drop. Need the funds for another purchase!

This would make an interesting gift for someone, a piece of 19th Century collecting of American history. 

Lowered Price - $55 F/F 

I'm offering Mad Bear a PSA 1 1888 N36 American Indian for $60 dlvd f/f (OBO).  Let me know your thoughts.

[url][url=https://flic.kr/p/JTjRKc][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4699/28147804909_dfc4841a82.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/JTjRKc]IMG_0192[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/157544384@N07/]michael scott[/url], on Flickr[/URL]

If you know someone interested let me know or pass along my info. Thanks!
